SEARCH
Package Sprites.Player

Class Player

java.lang.Object
Sprites.Sprite
Sprites.Player.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
Object, Subscriber
public class Player extends Sprite implements Subscriber
Represents the player character controlled by the user. Handles movement, shooting, animations, health, and observer notifications.

  • Field Summary
